short_description:
Love Me Bath Shimmer Bomb 180g

Fizz away your evening with this uplifting blend of cinnamon leaf, orange sweet and frankincense. Packed full of anti-aging ingredients that will help to tone your skin. The perfect natural pampering bath with benefits!

Love Me Patchouli, Honey & Oatmeal Natural Soap 90g

Your skin will love this fabulously festive natural hand and body soap. Packed full of an uplifting yet comforting blend of essential oils, skin rejuvenating patchouli and intensly moisturising honey and oatmeal.

name: Create Your Own Lip Balms
short_description: Beauty Kitchen lip balms are an easy way to keep your lips moisturised, a must have essential in any handbag or pocket. Now you can make your very own lip balms and help yourself to kissably soft lips. The good news is this kit makes 4 lip balms so your friends can have kissably soft lips too!

name: Lip Balm Collection
short_description:
Everyone wants kissably soft lips and with this trio there's no reason why you shouldn't. Our handy natural lip balm trio contains three different balms that are packed full of nature's finest ingredients to nourish and soften lips. Simply mix and match to suit your mood!

Inspire Me adds a citrus zing to kick start your day, Refresh Me works its minty magic to get you through the afternoon and Love Me has a warm, soothing scent to get those hot lips ready for the evening.

name: Chill Me Create Your Own Bath Bombs
short_description: Everyone loves bath bombs and making them is just as much fun as watching them fizz! This kit provides everything you need to make 300g of bath bombs with 100% natural ingredients. Perfect gift for any age or simply something fun to do.

Inspire Me Hand & Body Lotion (200ml)
Enjoy the little things & treat yourself with this light, fast absorbing, moisture pcked lotion. Crammed with super effective orange sweet, grapefruit and lemongrass leaving your skin nourished, soft and subtly scented. Perfect for tired hands & limbs!

name: Abyssinian Oil Facial Cleansing Balm 60ml
short_description:
Fragrance free natural cleansing and age defense for sensitive, oily or dry skin.

This fragrance free, non-greasy, cleansing balm simply melts into the skin and easily removes impurities and make up to reveal soft, supple, glowing skin. It contains nourishing Shea Butter and Abyssinian oil, a turbo charged version of argan oil, to help replace essential skin lipids without blocking pores, to restore the skins natural elasticity.

name: Abyssinian Oil Aroma Facial Concentrate 30ml
short_description:
Intensive daily hydration and age defence treatment for sensitive, oily or dry skin.

This intensive daily moisturising oil is suitable for all skin types. It contains Abyssinian oil, a turbo charged version of argan oil, magnolia oil and palmarosa to balance the production of sebum and rosehip oil, which help to promote cellular development and collagen synthesis, which is important for keeping skin smooth and supple.

name: Abyssinian Oil Handbag Beauty Balm 30ml
short_description:
Your multi-purpose miracle for all skin types.

This multi-purpose miracle balm can be used as a rich cleanser, gentle exfoliant or deeply nourishing balm to quench areas of dry or dehydrated skin. The exceptionally high levels of potent oils are proven to help repair, firm, smooth, decongest and enrich the skin, restoring its natural radiance.

name: Abyssinian Oil Facial Moisture Cream 60ml
short_description:
Fragrance free natural hydration & age defence for sensitive, oily or dry skin.

This fragrance free moisture balm is perfect for anyone that wants natural hydration but hasn't converted to facial oils. It contains Abyssinian oil, a turbo charged version of argan oil, to help replace essential skin lipids without blocking pores, to restore the skins natural elasticity.

name: Miracle Mother Nature Facial Konjac Sponge
short_description:
Gentle exfoliating cleansing for even the most sensitive skin.

Simple, effective, deep cleansing & pure. Our konjac sponge is eco friendly, 100% natural and made from pure edible vegetable roots. It cleanses the skin like nothing you've ever experienced before, leaving the face clean, glowing and silky smooth.

short_description:

name: Skin Care Starter Kit
short_description:
Whether you're a beauty junkie or a skin care novice, this 100% natural kit is perfect for all skin types. What's more, it will last for up to 4 months (as you as you're not bathing in it!) which works out at less than 50p a day!

Abyssinian Oil is a turbo charged argan oil and it is in all of our skin care products. The oil comes from the Abyssinian plant without damaging it making this ingredient super sustainable. It deeply moisturises and repairs the skin whilst smoothing and restoring your natural glow.

short_description:
